"Accents colouring the costume!":
"Yup, I have already decided on the clothes for the
costume, and also more or less thought out the
interesting and cute action in order to liven up the
atmostphere...
But somehow, they lack impact.
With that, I have a request for you!
Could you get something with rappies and that only
appears during this season?!
*Target Jacko Rappy"

"うーん、仮装用の衣装も決まったし
盛り上げる為のおもしろかわいい動きも
大体まとまったんだけど……
何というか、インパクトに欠けるのよね。

そこで貴方にお願いがあるの！
この季節にしか出没しないラッピーの
持っている物を拝借してきて！

※ラタン・ラッピーが対象"
